### ğŸ” Security & Vulnerabilities

**Found a security issue?**

âš ï¸ **IMPORTANT:** Report security issues privately!

#### Report Process:

1. **Contact immediately:**
   - ğŸ“§ Email: Osamaqonaibe@outlook.com (Subject: [SECURITY])
   - ğŸ“± WhatsApp: +972 534 414 330
   - â˜ï¸  Phone: +972 534 414 330

2. **Include details:**
   - Vulnerability description
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Impact assessment
   - Your contact information

3. **Timeline:**
   - Acknowledgment: Within 24 hours
   - Investigation: Within 48 hours  
   - Fix/Response: Within 72 hours
   - Coordinated disclosure

**Read more:** [SECURITY.md](.github/SECURITY.md)

## ğŸ“Š Common Questions

### How do I get the contract address?

```
Contract Address: 0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e

Verify on:
- BSCScan: https://bscscan.com/address/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e
- Sourcify: https://sourcify.dev/#/lookup/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e
```

### How do I integrate ROUM Token?

```
See: docs/INTEGRATION.md
For help: Osamaqonaibe@outlook.com
```

### What network is ROUM on?

```
Network: Binance Smart Chain (BSC)
Chain ID: 56
RPC: https://bsc-dataseed1.binance.org:8545
```

### How do I verify the contract?

```
âœ… BSCScan: https://bscscan.com/address/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e
âœ… Sourcify: https://sourcify.dev/#/lookup/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e

Both show âœ… VERIFIED status
```

### Is the contract secure?

```
âœ… Verified on BSCScan
âœ… Verified on Sourcify  
âœ… No external dependencies
âœ… No proxy contract
âœ… Owner renounced
âœ… Built-in overflow protection (Solidity 0.8.33)


For security details: docs/SECURITY.md
```

### What is the token supply?

```
Total Supply: 1,000,000,000 ROUM
Decimals: 18
Circulating: 100% (1,000,000,000 ROUM)
Locked: None
Vesting: None
```

### How do I report a bug?

```
Option 1 (Quick):
- WhatsApp: +44 741 129 012
- Phone: +44 741 129 012

Option 2 (Detailed):
- GitHub Issues: https://github.com/Osama-Qonaibe/ROUM-Token/issues

Option 3 (Email):
- Osamaqonaibe@outlook.com
```

### How do I report a security issue?

```
âš ï¸ IMPORTANT: Report privately!

1. Email: Osamaqonaibe@outlook.com
   Subject: [SECURITY] Issue description
   
2. Or WhatsApp/Phone: +972 534 414 330

3. Include:
   - Vulnerability description
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Impact assessment
   - Your contact info
```

### What support hours are available?

```
General Support: 24/7
Developer: 24/7 WhatsApp/Phone
           24 hours via email
           
Response times:
- WhatsApp: Usually immediate
- Phone: Usually immediate  
- Email: Within 24 hours
```

## ğŸ’ Before You Contact

### Check These First

1. ğŸ“‹ **Read Documentation**
   - [README.md](../README.md)
   - [INTEGRATION.md](../docs/INTEGRATION.md)
   - [FAQ section above](#-common-questions)

2. ğŸ”— **Check Links**
   - [BSCScan Contract](https://bscscan.com/address/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e)
   - [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/Osama-Qonaibe/ROUM-Token/issues)
   - [Sourcify](https://sourcify.dev/#/lookup/0x35B1761B00AB98144fAB4dEDBD58C59A2050947e)

3. ğŸ” **Search**
   - GitHub issues for similar problems
   - Documentation for answers
   - FAQs for common questions

### Prepare Your Information

Before contacting, have ready:
- Description of your issue
- Error messages or screenshots
- Steps to reproduce
- Your system/network information
- Relevant wallet/contract addresses
- Transaction hashes (if applicable)
